organizations: Division II New York Institute of Technology
lead_paragraph: The Duke men’s team, returning from the rape scandal that led to the shutdown of the program last season, will play in an exhibition tournament today in Rockville Centre, N.Y. It will be the first time the team has participated in an off-campus game since rape allegations against three players led the university to cancel the remainder of the season in April. The Blue Devils begin play in the Long Island Fall tournament with a two-hour exhibition against Towson, followed by scrimmages against Hofstra and Division II New York Institute of Technology. The tournament will raise money for charity.
